function.name: loadxml
function.description: Loads the local XML file uri and returns an XML object.

example.description: Assuming we have an XML file note.xml which contains the following:

examples.example: <note id="1"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment> <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>
This was sent to James as well John has not responded to the invitation
